segments.text: I don't know why Mark often comes to me and asks me for advice . I smell some rat in it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He is sly . He is actually angling for compliments . But he may have got the crush on you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nonsense ! There's no indication that he's in love with me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Keep your fingers crossed . He may pop the question one of these days .
segments.speaker: S2
